messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: My crush is obsessed with NBC’s The Voice—he has binged Season 1~26. I’m putting together a slick cheat sheet so we can geek out together.
For every season, could you list:
the season number, premiere date (Ep 1, YYYY-MM-DD), finale date (YYYY-MM-DD), total episode count, host(s), coaches line-up (separated by comma), Mega Mentor, winner’s name, winner’s final coach, winner’s Blind-Audition song, winner’s finale song, and the winning coach’s cumulative titles after that season. If it doesn't have a Mega Mentor, please enter 'N/A' into the table.

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following columns in order:
Season Number, Premiere Date(Ep 1, YYYY-MM-DD), Finale Date (YYYY-MM-DD), Total Episode Count, Host(s), Coaches Line-up, Mega Mentor, Winner, Winner’s Final Coach, Winner’s Blind-Audition Song, Winner’s Finale Song, Winning coach’s Cumulative Titles.
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

To gather all the required details for each season of The Voice, I need to conduct an online search to find comprehensive data about each season. Let's start with searching:

<search>NBC's The Voice season by season premiere date, finale date, total episode count, host(s), coaches lineup, Mega Mentor, winner, winner's finale song, winning coach's cumulative titles</search>

Search query: NBC's The Voice season by season premiere date, finale date, total episode count, host(s), coaches lineup, Mega Mentor, winner, winner's finale song, winning coach's cumulative titles
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Voice_(American_TV_series)):
The Voice (American TV series) - Wikipedia The Voice is an American singing reality competition television series that premiered on NBC on April 26, 2011.

[Doc 2](https://www.nbc.com/nbc-insider/every-winner-of-the-voice-through-the-years):
Every Winner of The Voice From Season 1 Through Season 28 - NBC Get an update on every Artist who won "The Voice" from the first season in 2011 to the current one. Read details here about The Voice ...

[Doc 3](https://internationalbroadcasts.fandom.com/wiki/The_Voice_(US)):
The Voice (US) | International Broadcasts Wiki - Fandom The Voice is an American singing competition television series broadcast on NBC. It premiered during the spring television cycle on April 26, 2011.
<search>season 1 premiere date finale date total episode count hosts coaches lineup mega mentor winner finale song winning coach cumulative titles</search>

Search query: season 1 premiere date finale date total episode count hosts coaches lineup mega mentor winner finale song winning coach cumulative titles
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Voice_(American_TV_series)_season_1):
The Voice (American TV series) season 1 The inaugural season premiered April 26, 2011, and ended on June 29, 2011, with the live finale. Javier Colon was named the winner of the inaugural season.

[Doc 2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Voice_(American_TV_series)):
The Voice (American TV series) The Voice is an American singing reality competition television series that premiered on NBC on April 26, 2011.

[Doc 3](https://the-voice-x.fandom.com/wiki/The_Voice_(American_TV_series)_season_1):
The Voice (American TV series) season 1 Episode 1 (April 26) The coaches performed coach CeeLo's song, "Crazy" at the start of the show.

Based on these findings:

<search>season 2 premiere date finale date total episode count hosts coaches lineup mega mentor winner finale song winning coach cumulative titles</search>

Search query: season 2 premiere date finale date total episode count hosts coaches lineup mega mentor winner finale song winning coach cumulative titles
